title: Beautiful West Village 3 Bedroom
posting_body: ['Renovated 3 bedroom with large, private garden!', 'Granite kitchen with dishwasher, wine cooler, marble bathroom, hardwood floors & an in-unit washer & dryer.', 'Available for September 1st occupancy.', 'Located between the West Village and Chelsea.', 'Steps from great restaurants, nightlife, and cafes.', 'Excellent location for transit.', 'Just off the 1, 2, 3, A, C, E, L, and PATH trains.', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', 'Washer / Dryer', 'High Ceilings', 'KITCHEN', 'Dishwasher', 'Countertops [Granite]', 'BATHROOM', 'Marble', 'OUTDOOR SPACE', 'Balcony', 'BUILDING DESCRIPTION', 'Pre-war', 'Built 1926', 'Low-rise', '5 Floors', '31 Apartments', 'Elevator', 'Voice Intercom', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'Renovated Windows', 'BUILDING POLICIES', 'Sublets Allowed.', 'Income Required: 40x Rent', 'Guarantors Allowed', 'Guarantors Income Required: 60x Rent', 'Corporate Guarantors Allowed', 'Corporate Leases: Allowed', 'Diplomats Welcome', 'Shares Allowed', 'Walls Allowed', 'Minimum Term: 12 months', 'BUILDING PET POLICY', 'Pets Allowed.']
